job_history.work_description: Achieved corporate goals through the development and execution of strategy, policy, and leadership. Primarily, but not limited to activities relating to master planning, tactical purchasing, receiving, warehousing, and shipping, and general materials Management. Created and implemented Supply Chain Operational Excellence plan and Business Process Improvement plan to increase inventory turns (from 4 average turns per year to 7 average annual turns per year) within a high mix, low volume global business environment.

Responsible for sourcing and procuring all material required for repair and overhaul of jet engine and components as well as all contracts for outside services and long term agreements with suppliers. Controlled $1.5 million in component parts inventory while maintaining 12 inventory turns annually.

Interacted with Department heads to ensure the highest quality proposal was provided by meeting the customers' requirements for Value Added Services Programs, valued at $1.5 Billion. Reviewed terms and conditions to ensure requirements are in line with B/E policies as well as regulations such as DFAR, ITAR, and Proprietary parts licensing.

Purchasing and Procurement of military and civilian equipment. Reviewed the accuracy of purchase orders to ensure appropriate use of government funds. Maintained inventory control through quarterly cycle counts.

skills.name: Supply Chain Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in supply chain management, having held roles such as Supply Chain Manager and Materials Manager, and achieved significant improvements in inventory turns, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has demonstrated leadership skills through the development and execution of strategy, policy, and leadership in various roles, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Procurement
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in procurement, having sourced and procured materials for various organizations, including military and civilian equipment, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Has maintained inventory control through quarterly cycle counts and controlled $1.5 million in component parts inventory, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Contract Management
skills.explanation: Has reviewed terms and conditions of contracts to ensure requirements are in line with policies and regulations, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Business Process Improvement
skills.explanation: Has created and implemented Business Process Improvement plans to increase inventory turns, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has managed various projects, including the development and execution of strategy, policy, and leadership, suggesting solid working proficiency.
